title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added firewall rule for SSH over HTTPS (`ssh.github.com`) to corporate proxy documentation.
Clarified audit log streaming only includes security-relevant API requests.
Updated cost center allocation: Copilot billing attributed to the organization providing the license; detailed usage reports show billed organization.
Noted outside collaborators on public repositories do not consume license seats.
Added Fireworks AI as a subprocessor for AI services.
Clarified cost centers apply only to metered usage, not subscription billing.
summary:
- Added firewall rule for SSH over HTTPS (`ssh.github.com`) to corporate proxy documentation.
- Clarified audit log streaming only includes security-relevant API requests.
- Updated cost center allocation: Copilot billing attributed to the organization providing the license; detailed usage reports show billed organization.
- Noted outside collaborators on public repositories do not consume license seats.
- Added Fireworks AI as a subprocessor for AI services.
- Clarified cost centers apply only to metered usage, not subscription billing.
generated_title: Update security rules, audit log streaming, billing attribution, and subprocessors
commits: **25b189d**: Add firewall rule to restricting access through corporate proxies (#57324) (by Melanie Yarbrough)
**0457a4f**: Add Fireworks AI to subprocessors list (#57321) (by Kayla Reiman)
**a7933e7**: Update cost center docs and clarify Copilot organization assignment (#57320) (by Greg Mondello)
**87f1e58**: Update github-license-users.md to state that outside collaborators on an org's `public` repositories do not consume a seat (#57325) (by bss-mc)
**2165c22**: Adding note about API events that are audit log streamed (#57295) (by Tim)
original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added firewall rule for SSH over HTTPS (`ssh.github.com`) to corporate proxy documentation.
- Clarified audit log streaming only includes security-relevant API requests.
- Updated cost center allocation: Copilot billing attributed to the organization providing the license; detailed usage reports show billed organization.
- Noted outside collaborators on public repositories do not consume license seats.
- Added Fireworks AI as a subprocessor for AI services.
- Clarified cost centers apply only to metered usage, not subscription billing.

### Title
Update security rules, audit log streaming, billing attribution, and subprocessors
